author: potuz
content: Hello, can you guys point me to the url to get the testvectors nightly builds?

author: potuz
content:
we currently use 
```
    url = "https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/archive/refs/tags/%s.tar.gz" % consensus_spec_version,
```
Is it of this form too?

author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content: They are avaiable as a Github Actions artifact. Take a look here: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/actions/workflows/generate_vectors.yml

author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content: <@755590043632140352> the latest one right now is: https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/actions/runs/10933306850

author: potuz
content: Thanks yeah I can't use that in CI in a simple way, but I can use that locally, thanks.

author: lucassaldanhaconsensys
content: atm they are not avaiable as a "fixed" url. So I guess locally is your best bet for now ðŸ™‚
